name: banana bread matcha
instructions: sift matcha into chawan.
add hot water and whisk in zig-zag motion, until frothy.
get a cup of ice and add the banana bread syrup and milk of choice.
pour the matcha on top and add more milk and/or syrup to your liking.

name: blueberry matcha
instructions: sift matcha into chawan.
add hot water and whisk in zig-zag motion, until frothy.
get a cup of ice and add the blueberry syrup and milk of choice.
pour the matcha on top and add more milk and/or syrup to your liking.

name: cookie butter matcha
instructions: in a small bowl add the cookie butter and a splash of milk.
microwave in 10 second intervals until fully dissolved in the milk. put aside.
sift matcha into chawan.
add hot water and whisk in zig-zag motion, until frothy.
get a cup of ice and add the cookie butter mixture and milk of choice.
pour the matcha on top and add more milk and/or cookie butter to your liking.

name: earl grey matcha
instructions: sift matcha into chawan.
add hot water and whisk in zig-zag motion, until frothy.
get a cup of ice and add the earl grey syrup and milk of choice.
pour the matcha on top and add more milk and/or syrup to your liking.

name: strawberry matcha
instructions: sift matcha into chawan.
add hot water and whisk in zig-zag motion, until frothy.
get a cup of ice and add the strawberry syrup (or strawberry jam) and milk of choice.
pour the matcha on top and add more milk and/or syrup to your liking.

name: banana bread latte
instructions: pour expresso into a cup and mix in the banana bread syrup.
add in your choice of milk and top off with ice. add more banana bread syrup to your liking.

name: brown sugar shaken expresso
instructions: pour expresso into a mason jar full of ice.
add brown sugar syrup and cinnamon. close the lid and shake until combined.
top off with your choice of milk and shake more if needed. add more brown sugar syrup to your liking.

name: caramel macchiato
instructions: pour expresso into a cup and mix in the caramel sauce and vanilla syrup until fully dissolved.
add in your choice of milk and top off with ice. add more caramel and/or vanilla syrup to your liking.

name: cookie butter latte
instructions: add the cookie butter and a splash of milk into a cup.
microwave in 10 second intervals until fully dissolved in the milk.
add the rest of your milk and expresso to the cup and top with ice. add more cookie butter to your liking.

name: banana bread syrup
instructions: heat bananas in a pan with the sugar and water over medium heat. stir occasionally.
as banana warms up mash it into smaller pieces.
add maple syrup, cinnamon and vanilla extract. continue to simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
remove syrup from stove and let it cool before blending. store in fridge for up to 2 weeks.

name: blueberry syrup
instructions: mix blueberries, water and sugar together over low heat until sugar is dissolved.
increase to medium heat, stirring often until syrup thickens.
stir the lemon juice into the syrup and let it cool.
blend the syrup to get rid of blueberry chunks. store in fridge for up to 2 weeks.

name: brown sugar syrup
instructions: add brown sugar and water to a pot and stir on low heat until fully dissolved.
simmer for 5 minutes then let it cool before using. store in fridge for up to 2 weeks.

name: earl grey syrup
instructions: add water to a pot and seep the earl grey tea bags. let it simmer for 10 minutes.
remove tea bags and add in the sugar. stir until dissolved.
continue to simmer for another 10 minutes.
remove syrup from stove and let it cool before using. store in fridge for up to 2 weeks.

name: strawberry syrup
instructions: mix strawberries, water and sugar together over low heat until sugar is dissolved.
increase to medium heat, stirring often until syrup thickens.
stir the lemon juice into the syrup and let it cool.
blend the syrup to get rid of strawberry chunks. store in fridge for up to 2 weeks.

name: vanilla syrup
instructions: mix sugar and water together over low heat until sugar is dissolved.
add vanilla extract and simmer for 5 minutes.
take syrup off the stove and let it cool. store in fridge for up to 2 weeks.

name: blueberry cold foam
instructions: add ingredients into a cup and froth. you can add more syrup to your liking.
top it on your drink. store in fridge for up to 1 week.

name: cheese foam
instructions: place the cream cheese in a mixing bowl and add sugar and salt.
use a hand mixer to mix until light and fluffy.
add heavy cream and continue to whip until light and fluffy.
slowly add in the milk and continue mixing. you want a light, fluffy consistency. (not too thick)
add to your drink. store in fridge for up to 1 week.

name: cookie butter cold foam
instructions: add ingredients into a cup and froth. you can add more syrup to your liking. (recommended to warm up the cookie butter)
top it on your drink. store in fridge for up to 1 week.

name: strawberry cold foam
instructions: add ingredients into a cup and froth. you can add more syrup to your liking. (you can also use strawberry jam instead)
top it on your drink. store in fridge for up to 1 week.

name: vanilla cold foam
instructions: add ingredients into a cup and froth. you can add more syrup to your liking.
top it on your drink. store in fridge for up to 1 week.
